channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Flooding; INC#1223; 07:00PM; 3995 N Avenida Del Sol; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pbm0bn; #StudioCity; Prior to 7:00 PM, firefighters and LADWP responders were able to stop the high pressure, high volume flow of water from a fire hydrant sheared by a vehicle that departed the scene prior to their arrival. Damaged by floodwater were the unoccupied sanctuary and as many as *five* unoccupied classrooms at nearby Saint Michael & All Angels Episcopal Church. Firefighters are continuing their hours long effort to sweep water and salvage precious contents from the sanctuary and classrooms. The L.A Department of Building & Safety has been summoned (unknown ETA) to formally evaluate the extent of damage to the buildings. No injury.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E239 E260 E278 T39 T60 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1316; 06:30PM; 16450 W Tribune St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CtfSUA; #GranadaHills; 27 LAFD Firefighters took just 16 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames within a rear section of a 1,334 square-foot one story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E275 E287 E75 E87 RA87 T75 T87; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1316; 06:14PM; 16450 W Tribune St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CtfSUA; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: Fire showing from the rear of a one-story home.; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E275 E287 E75 E87 RA87 T75 T87; CH9; 18; Brian Humphrey

Update Flooding; INC#1223; 06:00PM; 3995 N Avenida Del Sol; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pbm0bn; #StudioCity; Flood waters that continue to flow from a sheared high pressure fire hydrant (circumstances yet undetermined), have led to the flooding of the unoccupied sanctuary and as many as eight unoccupied classrooms at the (tentatively identified) Saint Michael & All Angels Episcopal Church. No injury. No evacuation. LADWP is en route to assist (unknown ETA).; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 T60 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Flooding; INC#1223; 05:23PM; 3995 N Avenida Del Sol; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Pbm0bn; #StudioCity; PRELIM: Water from a sheared fire hydrant (circumstances yet unknown), are currently flooding three classrooms at an unoccupied (and yet to be identified) school. No injury. No evacuation. LADWP en route to assist (unknown ETA).; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E108 E260 E278 T60 T78; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1068; 04:09PM; 3453 N Caribeth Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/43D8L7E; #Encino; 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 21 minutes to access the site and extinguish flames, confining the fire within the attached garage of a 4,750 square-foot two story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E109 E288 E293 E83 E88 RA83 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1068; 03:48PM; 3453 N Caribeth Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/43D8L7E; #Encino; PRELIM: Two story single family home with fire showing from the attached garage, extending into the 4,750 square-foot home.; FS 109; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 E109 E288 E293 E83 E88 RA83 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Agency Assist; INC#0556; 12:30PM; 8591 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/45Z9p0Z; #StudioCity; LAPD has safely assisted the male in exiting his parked vehicle, and taken him into custody. He will be examined by LAFD Paramedics, prior to LAPD or LAFD transport to a facility most appropriate to his current needs. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD North Hollywood Division (Incident #1637); FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E27 E278 E288 E41 E88 E97 EM14 HR3 RA78 RA88 RA97 T60 T78 T88 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#0556; 10:37AM; 8591 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/45Z9p0Z; #StudioCity; PRELIM: LAFD requested by LAPD to stage nearby as law enforcement seeks to assist a male driver (only) inside a vehicle parked near a steep hillside, possibly intending self-harm. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD North Hollywood Division (Incident #1637); FS 97; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC14 E260 E27 E278 E288 E41 E88 E97 EM14 HR3 RA78 RA88 RA97 T60 T78 T88 UR27 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#0915; 03:43PM; 4720 S La Brea Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3X0OK8G; Baldwin Hills/Crenshaw; KNOCKDOWN: 42 LAFD firefighters in coordination with a full brush response from LACoFD full contained and extinguished the fire in 1hr 43min with no injuries reported. While there were resources in place to provide structural defense if needed, the quick action of the two agencies ensured no homes were under direct fire threat. Some LACoFD resources will be remaining to assist LAFD with the mop up operation to ensure no hot spot remains. The fire was held to approximately 2 acres. No further details. #KingIC ; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E290 E294 E34 E43 E62 E66 E68 E94 EM13 EM18 H2 H3 H7 HA2 HA3 HA7 RA43 RA94 T90 T94; CH5; 13; Margaret Stewart
